definition: (of skin) deeply suntanned, an orange of low brightness and saturation, to make brown in color
details:
adjective
- (of skin) deeply suntanned
= synonyms: browned
- of a color similar to that of wood or earth
= synonyms: brownish, chocolate-brown, dark-brown
noun
- an orange of low brightness and saturation
= synonyms: brownness
verb
- to make brown in color
= example: to make brown in color
= synonyms: embrown
- to fry in a pan until it changes color
= example: to fry in a pan until it changes color
